data.title: Ollie Cahill on LinkedIn: A brilliant evening with Desy Balmer introducing the kids to mindset, goal‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: A brilliant evening with Desy Balmer introducing the kids to mindset, goal setting and self awareness. Tools that will help them in life and not just on the‚Ä¶
data.text:
Every session is a lesson when I show up at your house. The mentoring lesson of the day is responsibility, our ability to respond to life's situations. It's about recognizing that our actions have consequences and taking ownership of them. And let's not forget the hours of practice it takes to become an expert at a certain craft. With my volleyball ladies, we focus on dynamic stability, core stability, and glut engagement. Trust me, these are skills that will elevate your game to the next level. And on Tuesdays, it's all about resistance training for my older ladies and men. Don't miss out on these valuable lessons that are available in every session. Be astute enough to understand them and put them into practice. It's time to take control of your life and become the best version of yourself. #everysessionisalesson #CoachDC.

Never complain about the refs when you lose. (What started as basketball advice has become life advice.) Bringing your concerns forward when you‚Äôre up looks collaborative and in the interest of lifting everyone. Bringing concerns when you‚Äôre down looks like whining. Learn this and the 3Ô∏è‚É£ steps to giving that coaching to the refs of your life in this week‚Äôs blog. Click the link to check it out! https://lnkd.in/e2NCenSn

Discipline has to be one of the very most important contributors to success on a rugby field. In this post I take a look at some of the considerations a coach might look at to improve the performance of their team! Jump on board GDD Coaching with a FREE trial! https://lnkd.in/ezFhfVSU

Being able to help lead young men when they face adversity and teach them how to be resilient people is awesome. Leading them to accept what‚Äôs on film and face their struggles to learn and grow from it, is why I got into coaching. When you‚Äôre able to teach life skills through the sport you love, it makes being in this position not feel like a job. I love being able to educate players and have teaching moments through the good, bad, and ugly. How you handle yourself when things aren‚Äôt going your way will show you who you really are. Continue to Chop!! Rock Chalk! #kufootball #playerdevelopment #collegefootball #professionaldevelopment #personaldevelopment #nfl #lifeskills #athlete #teachingmoments #playerengagement #lifeafterfootball #winningmindset #whatdriveswinning

Consider it as learning from someone else about how you can develop. It is an attitude that people must have when they hear feedback from others in order to properly interpret it. Your basketball coach should not allow you to continue making the same mistakes that aren't helping you improve. #wednesdaynotes #virtualassistant #virtualassistance #cbvirtualnotes #cherrydeebalilu #vaphilippines #virtualassistantph #wednesdaypost #valife #virtualassistantlife #work #business

Been a huge 8 months coaching the Suns Under 16 group. Has been a great period of learning and growth individually as a coach and person, and have learned so much around building a strong environment, planning, teaching fundamentals and game style and reviewing players individually. Whilst it wasn‚Äôt successful in terms of win/loss, I know we have seen 36 boys improve no end from when they started, and have given them the foundations to progress their game no matter what level they end up playing at. #football #coaching #review
